name: Gem Venture
description:
A wandering miner is destined to restore the Sacred Gems that maintain the world's life energy, or else it will become a land of nothingness under the rule of Tourmaline. Restore the Sacred Gems across 8 different areas while jumping, dashing, and mining your way through obstacles and enemies.



Along with your partner Bixbi, you will meet various people and help restore the Sacred Gems in each area. Use your trusty pickaxe or well timed jumps to defeat Tourmaline's henchmen and the negative creatures at his disposal.




  • Over 40 levels of platforming goodness.
  • Travel across each area in any order, and after reaching a certain event will make your path straightforward.
  • Utilizing well timed jumps, slides, and dashes will allow you to access different paths and hidden secrets.
  • You will be able to gain items to restore your health after receiving damage, and leveling up will increase your maximum HP and Attack Power. To level up, you will need to defeat several enemies to increase your XP. After leveling up multiple times, your Attack Power will increase as well.
  • To gain even more XP, perform Stylish Moves by pressing the jump button again after bouncing off an enemy. Try to reach the maximum level if you can!
  • There are numerous Character Cards scattered throughout the land. If you're a completionist, try collecting them all!
